markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Serpentine Swimmer](/Feats.aspx?ID=3994) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 50</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Water Nagaji](/Feats.aspx?ID=3986)

</column>

---

You undulate your body in a series of sinuous serpentine motions as you swim, drastically improving the speed at which you move through the water. Your swim Speed increases from 10 feet to 25 feet.
name: Serpentine Swimmer
